ygData.subject: Re: Rodimus
ygData.msgSnippet: Maximadid as was asked, without question or looking at Hydras. Touching a few buttons, then within a second was Nightlight s voice & some torturing moments.

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Maximadid as was asked, without question or looking at Hydras. 

Touching a few buttons, then within a second was Nightlight's voice & some 
torturing moments. Not screams much, but some slight noticing moments of pain... 
as well as the moment she was reprogrammed into Blackstorm... & Perceptor's 
little informative reprogramming of who she was. & her acknowledgement of she 
being Blackstorm & no longer Nightlight. There was no mention.. of Nightlight. 
Just... Blackstorm. 

Her crimson optics glanced up to Rodimus & a wicked smirk cracked her face. 
Oh, she was enjoying this. The more torture for him, the better. 

--part1_177.1c6923bc.2c2635f0_boundary
